short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic ratings in Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the latest IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic ratings on your screen, you can find the best movies and TV shows Netflix has to offer.

Ratings are displayed in the details panel for movies/shows. Bear in mind not all sites have ratings, for example, it seems like most TV shows only have ratings on IMDb.
